pkgmetadata.longdescription: Tiered PC Algorithm // Constraint-based causal discovery using the PC algorithm while accounting for a partial node ordering, for example a partial temporal ordering when the data were collected in different waves of a cohort study. Andrews RM, Foraita R, Didelez V, Witte J (2021) arXiv:2108.13395 provide a guide how to use tpc to analyse cohort data.
